Name: Ski Sport: Jumping VR
About the game: Ski jumping VR simulator Beta Immersive winter environment and realistic physics. Just like in real life, use your skills, change the position of your body to influence the speed and beat your records. The game • Accurate simulation of ski jumping • Immersive winter environment • HTC Vive & Oculus Rift support • Scoreboard • Full HD This is an Early Access version of the game. We want to keep developing it based on your feedbacks. Please contact us with feature requests.
